channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:29 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 16:29 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
